rest.ftp

Class FTPSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • rest.ftp.FTPSession

  • public class FTPSession
extends java.lang.Object
    A connexion between a Client and a FTPServer. Used to connect a client to the FTPServer when the user uses the resource FTPResource. The FTPServer is the server on the address 127.0.0.1 on port 4223.
    Author:
    cachera - falez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String address
      The address of the FTPServer to connect to
      private org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPClient ftp
      The FTPServer client who will be connected as "user" with the root directory "user_normal".
      private int port
      The port of the FTPServer to connect to

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FTPSession()
      Connect the client to the FTPServer 127.0.0.1 on port 4223

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Make a clean quit between the client and the FTPServer

      Tests if the path uri is a directory and goes into it if it is.
      void login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Log in the client into the FTPServer on the "user" account.
